item.title: Tomcat
item.description: Tomcat (also known as Apache Tomcat or Tomcat Server) is an open source Java Servlet Container. You can use Metriclyâ€™s Java agent to collect information on your Tomcat Server. Prerequisites Java Agent Configure Navigate to the zorka.properties file. Comment out the Default collection scripts section. # Default collection of jvm metrics # scripts = jvm.bsh 3. Uncomment the Apache Tomcat scripts section. # Example: Apache Tomcat configuration with CAS server scripts = jvm.
